TopicTitle: Better IVA for the STOCK MK2 AND MK3 airplane cockpits

Articles.Content: In the current IVA for these cockpits it's pretty lame because your just looking at a wall I hope they plan to add windows/glass and make these cockpits cooler so I can fly my jets in cockpit view

I'm pretty sure this is being planned for 0.25, most spaceplane parts will be redone for the update. Mk1 got retextured, Mk2 got revamped with the Spaceplane+ mod, and Mk3 cockpits got totally remade.
One for the lab would be nice essential and it's about time we got one.
